MemberSignature.Value: public static void Fill<T> (this T[,] array, T value, int row, int col, int width, int height);
.method public static hidebysig void Fill<T>(!!T[,] array, !!T value, int32 row, int32 col, int32 width, int32 height) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Sub Fill(Of T) (array As T(,), value As T, row As Integer, col As Integer, width As Integer, height As Integer)
static member Fill : 'T[,] * 'T * int * int * int * int -> unit

Docs.param: Positive Width of area to fill.
Positive Height of area to fill.
Docs.summary: Fills in values of a multi-dimensional rectangular array to specified value based on the position and size given. Ranges given outside the bounds of the array will fill in as much as possible and ignore elements that should appear outside it. Won't throw bounds exception, just won't do work if ranges out of bounds.

Docs.summary: Retrieve a column from a multi-dimensional rectangular array.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<T> GetColumn<T> (this T[][] rectarray, int column);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<!!T> GetColumn<T>(!!T[][] rectarray, int32 column) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Iterator Function GetColumn(Of T) (rectarray As T()(), column As Integer) As IEnumerable(Of T)
static member GetColumn : 'T[][] * int -> seq<'T>

Docs.summary: Retrieve a column from a multi-dimensional jagged array. Will throw an exception if the column is out of bounds, and return default in places where there are no elements from inner arrays. Note: No equivalent GetRow method, as you can use array[row] to retrieve.
Docs.returns: Yielded Enumerable of column elements for given column and default values for smaller inner arrays.
